title: Can someone ID this?
content:
I want to know what is that retro typeface on the bottom of the soup can -- "Fit for a King". Drop me a line if you know! Thanks a millions in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [hobo-soup.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023175315/http:/typophile.com/files/hobo-soup.jpg) | 51.1 KB |
author: RJClouse

comments.content: The "Fit for a King" font is called Hellenic Wide, but there is a free font that looks just like it called "Biggen"
Urghs, I recommend not to use those freefont. Here is [Hellenic Wide](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023175315/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000096).
